entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
